OutputBucketName.Description: OPTIONAL: Bucket Name where the zip file output should be placed, if left blank a bucket name will be automatically generated.

AllowedIps.Description: gitpull method only. Comma seperated list of IP CIDR blocks for source IP authentication. The BitBucket Cloud IP ranges are provided as defaults.

ApiSecret.Description: gitpull method only. WebHook Secrets for use with GitHub Enterprise and GitLab. If a secret is matched IP range authentication is bypassed. Cannot contain: , \ "

GitToken.Description: zipdl method only. Personal access token, needed for GitHub Enterprise and GitLab
GitToken.ConstraintDescription: this token must be generated from the git server/provider

OauthKey.Description: zipdl method only. OAuth2 Key needed for BitBucket
OauthKey.ConstraintDescription: this key must be generated from the git server/provider

OauthSecret.Description: zipdl method only. OAuth2 Secret needed for BitBucket
OauthSecret.ConstraintDescription: this secret must be generated from the git server/provider

Properties.Description: git CodePipeline integration, bucket to store ssh keys
